entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer focused on building intelligent, scalable solutions that merge technology and agriculture to drive growth in underserved and rural markets. This work is built on FOSS principles.

projects.name: TessyFarm Nexus
projects.description: An AI and blockchain-powered FOSS platform that delivers data-driven efficiency and critical insights to small-scale farmers in rural Africa. It's essential technological infrastructure for sustainable agriculture.

channels.description: Support our collection of FOSS projects through our Open Collective page. All funds are publicly accounted for and directly support project growth and maintenance.

plans.name: General TessyFarm Support
plans.description: A recurring contribution to cover essential operational costs like server hosting, data storage, and core maintenance specifically for the TessyFarm Nexus project.

plans.name: AI Model Development Grant
plans.description: A strategic one-time grant to accelerate the development and training of new AI models for real-time crop disease detection and soil health analysis.
